Text.val: Wait for all sessions to be ready before exiting main process
Opschonen van de DGS detail tabel
Kopieren van pro-forma rentegegevens naar DGS detail tabel

ExpSyntax.val: 'DELETE FROM '&DbName ('{42,-1}'DSOURCE)&' WHERE DGSD_SOORT_SALDO=2 AND DGSD_SOORT_BEDRAG=111 AND (DGSD_TRANSDATUM<>'&DStr ({0,5},'YYYYMMDD')&' OR DGSD_TRANSDATUM='&DStr ({0,5},'YYYYMMDD')&' AND DGSD_RELATIE BETWEEN '&Trim (Str ({0,6},'9'))&' AND '&Trim (Str ({0,7},'9'))&')'
'DELETE FROM '&DbName ('{49,13}'DSOURCE)&' WHERE RRC_RELATIENUMMER BETWEEN '&Trim (Str ({0,6},'9'))&' AND '&Trim (Str ({0,7},'9'))&' AND RRC_RENTE_GEBOEKT=''P'' AND RRC_PROFORMA=1'
'DELETE FROM '&DbName ('{48,13}'DSOURCE)&' WHERE RR_RELATIENUMMER BETWEEN '&Trim (Str ({0,6},'9'))&' AND '&Trim (Str ({0,7},'9'))&' AND RR_GEBOEKT=9'

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select min( r.re_nummer), max( r.re_nummer), count (distinct r.re_nummer) from rekeningen r, rekeningen_per_product rpp where r.re_rente_berekenen = 1 AND rpp.rpp_relatienummer=r.re_nummer AND rpp.rpp_rekening_nummer=r.re_rekening AND rpp.rpp_rekeningsoort=r.re_soort AND rpp.rpp_valuta=r.re_muntsoort AND (~1 = 0 OR r.re_nummer >= ~1) AND (~2 = 999999999 OR r.re_nummer <= ~2) AND r.re_soort between 1000 and 1999

Text.val: Start date and time Main process are used for newly created sessions

SQL_STMT_U.val: select D.RELATIENR from (select rownum "RIJ", C.RELATIENR from (select distinct r.re_nummer "RELATIENR" from :1 r, :2 rpp where r.re_rente_berekenen = 1 AND rpp.rpp_relatienummer=r.re_nummer AND rpp.rpp_rekening_nummer=r.re_rekening AND rpp.rpp_rekeningsoort=r.re_soort AND rpp.rpp_valuta=r.re_muntsoort AND (~3 = 0 OR r.re_nummer >= ~3) AND (~4 = 999999999 OR r.re_nummer <= ~4) AND r.re_soort between 1000 and 1999 order by r.re_nummer)C )D where MOD(D.RIJ,~5)=0
